nodes.text: Kor-Lahvan was a location where the Rebel Alliance's 61st Mobile Infantry was once deployed in 0 BBY. There, Private Hazram Namir first realized that another 61st soldier, the ex-bounty hunter Brand, was observing him. In 3 ABY, while sterilizing water to drink on the jungle planet Coyerti, Namir and Brand were both reminded of their experiences at Kor-Lahvan.
Kor-Kahvan was mentioned in the 2015 novel Battlefront: Twilight Company, written by Alexander Freed.
